title: Major: Yuujou no Ikkyuu
description: After losing his father, Goro must face the new life that awaits him along with his adoptive mother, Momoko, who decides to marry the star of the Marine Stars, Hideki Shigeno, and move to Fukuoka. During the three years that Goro lives in Fukuoka, he continues playing baseball, until his shoulder, at the limit, is fractured. This special tells us a small period within these three years that could be placed between volumes 13 and 14, a story just mentioned above in the original manga.
